channel.title: Deep Learning on Afnan Alabdulwahab
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Afnan Alabdulwahab

item.title: Benchmarking GPU Matrix Operations Optimizations
item.description: Comprehensive benchmarking study of matrix transpose and multiplication optimizations across NVIDIA GPU architectures, analyzing performance characteristics and implementation strategies.

item.title: Speech Emotion Recognition
item.description: A deep learning-based approach to classifying human emotions from speech audio recordings using convolutional and recurrent neural networks.
